description:
Detects execution of "Diskshadow.exe" in script mode to execute an script with a potentially uncommon extension.
Initial baselining of the allowed extension list is required.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: False postitve might occur with legitimate or uncommon extensions used internally. Initial baseline is required.
name: Diskshadow Script Mode - Uncommon Script Extension Execution
query: (event.category:process AND (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:/[Dd][Ii][Ss][Kk][Ss][Hh][Aa][Dd][Oo][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Kk][Ss][Hh][Aa][Dd][Oo][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.command_line:(/.*\/[Ss]\ .*/ OR /.*\-[Ss]\ .*/)) AND (NOT process.command_line:/.*\.[Tt][Xx][Tt].*/))
